message: Hey there! Wondering if you want to get some lunch together?
Where can I download that template you made?
This UI Rocks! Thanks for showing me. I am going to use this on so many projects.
Client is happy. Thank goodness! Your amazing. Owe you a wiskey sour.
Some of your designs are pretty good, can we use you on a project I am working on?
Have you seen that new TV show?! Its amazing! Lets get together and watch it at lunch.
